youtube.title: Why High Blood Pressure is So Dangerous | Explained with Animation
youtube.description: Learn why high blood pressure (hypertension) is called the silent killer. This animated guide breaks down how high BP affects your heart, brain, and kidneys, and the lifestyle choices that lead to long-term health issues. Don't ignore your numbers!
